I noticed I was having trouble loading the Tyrx scenarios with the 
scenario converter I am programming and then I tried those scenarios 
with the other converter and it pooped up a message about the scenario 
 not being the correct version number.  Then, I payed a bit more 
attention the Tyrx scenarios are version 6.0.  

I am having to manually calculate the number of bytes in my file to 
make the viewing the information with for text edit perform at a 
decent speed.  Once I get my current step done, I'll compile it and 
let people examine phase 1 of the program.

Have all the built-in scenarios been converted to version 8.0?  If 
not, would saving the file with the built-in scenario editor result in 
a scenario file of version 8.0?
